article_metadata.news-keywords: Levine Cancer Institute, Carolinas HealthCare System, board meeting, Michael Tarwater, Derek Raghavan
article_metadata.description: Only four years after breaking ground for the Levine Cancer Institute on Morehead Street, Carolinas HealthCare System leaders announced a $150 million expansion plan Tuesday, noting the cancer program has exceeded growth expectations.
article_metadata.title: Carolinas HealthCare announces $150 million expansion for Levine Cancer Institute | The Charlotte Observer
